pedagogical examples –
Tha f(h)ios aig Iain. Tha f(h)ios agam. | A bheil cù agus cat aca, a bheil fios agad? | A bheil fios agaibh càite a bheil am banca agus oifis a’ phuist? | Chan eil fios agam cò a chuir an litir. A bheil fios agaibh cuin a thàinig an trèan? A bheil fios agad càit a bheil an stèisean? Chan eil fios aig Anna dè a thachair. | Chan eil f(h)ios aig duine. | Chan eil f(h)ios agam an tàinig Seumas. | Dh’fhosglainn an doras dhut nam biodh fios agam gun robh thu ann.
John knows. I know. | Do they have a dog and a cat, do you know? | Do you know where the bank and the post office are? | I don’t know who sent the letter. Do you know when the train came? Do you know where the station is? Ann doesn’t know what happened. | Nobody knows. | I don’t know whether James has come. | I would open the door for you if I knew you were there. td. 3 | 7 | 35 | 78 | 115 | 139 | 198
Chan eil sìon a dh’fhios agamsa.
I’ve no idea. td. 116
Examples from Gairm –
[...] Dh’fhàs a guth na bu làidir. “Tha aon rud cinnteach, chan fhalbh aon choigreach le mo leanabh. Cha teid i gu aon dannsa, tha sin cinnteach. Tha. Tha. Na bi smaoineachadh gun teid, a leanaibh. Chan eil fhios agad mu ’n deidhinn, mar a th’ agamsa.” “Carson nach do bhàsaich thu o chionn leth-cheud bliadhna,” dh’ éigh Màiri. Bha i smaoineachadh air na gnothaichean ud fhathast! “Greas ort leis an tea,” ars a màthair. Agus, mu dheireadh. “A’ chlann òga an diugh, chan eil fhios dé na smaointean th[a] ruith orra. Tha iad air bhoil, air bhoil.”
[...] Her voice grew louder. “One thing is certain, not one stranger will leave [go out?] with my child. She will not go to a single dance, that is certain. It is. It is. Do not be thinking that you will, child. You don’t know about them, as I do.” “Why did you not die fifty years ago,” shouted Mary. She was still thinking about those matters! “Hurry up with the tea,” said her mother. And, eventually. “The young children today, it is not known what thoughts are running on them. They are in a rage, in a rage.” td. 171, le Iain Mac a’ Ghobhainn No explicit experiencer.
